Wow, this is rather ordinary.

The "science" is so far from reality that it becomes a comedy. Cliches abound in a story that lacks a story line.

The scientist's wife is hot - that helps! :p

... and 6 Russian sailors can lift two 50 megaton nuclear warheads that somehow fit in a 5 tonne truck .... O K.

imdb has this listed as "tv"-is this a movie or what

50 mega tons describes the blast force not the weight! Megaton is millions of tons of TNT. Two 50 mega ton bombs not loaded in ICBMs would easily fit a 5ton truck. The Russians called those bombs Czar Bomba. Ez to find out online. The delivery system is what weighs a lot, not the fissle material. Research it!
